reviews.review_msg: Yeah, he's a demanding professor as far as professors go, but he is really committed to teaching. He makes time to help you with anything whenever he can and he seems genuinely interested in what students have to say. He is far from condescending and humble about his own knowledge and experience.

Shame on all of you slackers who insult Dr. Hira. Always willing to help. Yeah sure there is a lot of work in his class, but at the end of the semester you improve 200% in writing and analytical skills. If you are a lazy bum you will get smoked; and it appears that most of the people who made comments are.
